mapinfo.detailsText:
You are about to establish a colony in the southern part of Florida, surrounded by resources of every kind. 
 The starting market and the nearby trade route can help raising a strong economy in a short time. Sea resources could boost your economy even further. 
 Seminole and Carib natives may also help your cause providing useful technologies. 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Seminole / Caribs 
 -Mercenaries: Pirate 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
